title: What to Watch: Six Shows and a Documentary to Stream This Week
sub_head: ‘Acapulco’ examines the price one pays for dreams; viewers try to identify the murderer in ‘One of Us Is Lying’; and more to add to your queue
body:
There are at least two unique looks at the service industry that are streaming this week: one involving blue skies and marriage proposals at a Mexico resort, the other filled with baked goods and safety belts. Plus, Peacock launches a high-school murder mystery. Here’s where to find it all.
(Apple TV+)
